paragraph_1: ^Having grown stronger during the journey <color=#96d87d>Jade</color> is the first one to step forward. For as long as she can remember she has been jealous, but now? Now she is gonna be the one that others envy.
^Before the king or anyone else can act <color=#96d87d>Jade</color> pierces the king on her spear and turns him into stone. She crushes the statue before taking her rightful place on the throne.
